text: Sorry if this is a digression and over engineered for your use case but as you say "best", the answer is in mean variance optimization. The mathematically grounded way is that you come up with strategy expectations of returns and covariances and then blend all individual strategies into a meta strategy and trade that. The meta strategy assigns positions limits to ensure you don't blow through market capacity.

text: The bets you have in any selection are a weighted blend of your individual strategies (you can have 100s of stratts). The ensemble weights comes from backtest (or some other process) driven means and covariances. Essentially you up weight strategies that have high expectations of returns and introduce diversity
